channel.title: Projects on Himanshu Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Himanshu Mishra

item.title: PEP 8 Speaks
item.description: A GitHub integration to automatically review Python code style on Pull Requests. Currently used by pandas, Spyder IDE, scikit-image, scikit-learn-contrib, astropy, sunpy and 1300+ projects.

item.title: Keep
item.description: A Meta CLI toolkit : Personal shell command keeper and snippets manager
